name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 126
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Back To The USSR. With Russia seemingly invading the Ukraine, and Putins recent excursions into Kazakhstan and Belarus it seems as if he is intent on attempting to recreate that which has been lost, the Soviet Union. Unable to let go of what once was, Putin will seemingly stop at nothing to bring back a united Soviet Block. Colors inspired by both the Ukrainian and  Soviet flags.
